extends java.lang.Object

        public int changeShield(int val)
        Manipulates the shield amount of a combatant.
        Parameters:
        val - Integer value to add to shield, can be negative.
        Returns:
        Integer value of excess damage done.

        public boolean takeDamage(int damage)
        Deals damage to this combatant.
        Parameters:
        damage - Integer value of damage to be taken.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if combatant is still alive, false if combatant died.
